Text: Re Environmental Alert cancelled Cc know you are now capable of driving a Metro bus it is in your power to improve the quality of service to every bus riding man woman and child in Houston Ditch the Excusion and drive a bus Jeffery NRON AM To Susan ScottET NRON cc Jeff nron bcc Lisa KoobHOUEES Subject Re Environmental Alert cancelled Cool Maybe I can play Black Sabbath on my watt stereo for you guys on our way to work See if you get that kind of service on METRO Susan Scott AM To Jeff Dasovich cc Jeffery FawcettET NRON Subject Environmental Alert cancelled In compliance with the new Houston Clean Air standards Mr Fawcett has agreed to use his new vehicle for carpooling a generous gesture as we know he would much rather just ride the Metro bus to work
